sub_title: Executive Director MSc Programmes, Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University
summary: My passion lies in creating, developing, and managing diverse teams and inclusive work environments. I thrive in international environments and am a strong advocate for inclusiveness and diversity, sustainable development, and the rights of nature and animals. I have demonstrated resilience, action-orientation, and high ethical standards and have extensive experience in higher business education and corporate environments. In MBTI terms, I fluctuate between INFJ ("the advocate") and INTJ ("the architect"). Want to learn more? Happy to connect (unless you're trying to land a sales pitch).

authors.headline: Executive Director MSc Programmes, Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

company.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

profile_positions.company: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University
profile_positions.description: My team of currently 11 programme managers and assistants and I manage logistics and quality assurance for the MSc programme portfolio of 15 programmes with a total of 3,500 graduate students at a top university-based international business school, including the annual MSc education budget of €10M. In collaboration with the Dean of Education, the academic directors and other faculty members I orchestrate the strategic development of existing and new programmes, but also initiate new delivery modes and service innovations. I manage the interface with numerous related units, including the school's Executive Board, Admissions, Student Advisers, the Examination Board, the Career Centre, the Alumni Office, and central university services. I am responsible for educational policy development and quality assurance on the master programme level.
profile_positions.title: Executive Director MSc Programmes

profile_positions.company: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University
profile_positions.description: In this role I was responsible for preparation, data collection, organisational processing and coordinating activities of (re-) accreditations, evaluations and business school rankings. I analyzed outcomes and results, participated in policy initiatives, and implemented policies and quality improvements. I gave policy advice to the Executive Board of the business school.
profile_positions.title: Policy Advisor

profile_positions.company: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University
profile_positions.description: I was responsible for the development and execution of technical and marketing-related projects relating to the advancement of the business school's websites, Intranet, mobile app, and social media channels. I developed online and social media strategies, guidelines and policies. I was responsible for requirement definition, project planning, management of development, testing and release processes, and consulting of internal clients. I managed internal and external resources, including a web service team, web developers, web designers, system engineers, and content editors in two languages (English and Dutch).
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager Digital MarCom

profile_positions.company: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University
profile_positions.description:
I managed projects in the area of innovation and co-creation, sustainability and environmental protection. I led working groups on sustainable facility management, through social media, organization of publicity events, photography and documentation, networking, consulting, and marketing communications.
I also gave editorial support in the area of environmental policies, globalization and eco-certification.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: I was responsible for process excellence, continuous improvement, product quality, spare parts and aftersales service in the car audio and navigation systems aftermarket. I managed 5 direct reports in Germany and functionally managed a variety of supplier quality managers in Singapore and China.
profile_positions.title: Director of Business Excellence Aftermarket Infotainment

profile_positions.description: I was responsible for development and maintenance of an Internet-based sales engine for automotive navigation content. The system was used by several hundred thousand end customers. I closely worked simultaneously with 15 different service providers in Europe and Asia in the areas of IT development, hosting, billing and telecommunications. I managed supplier development projects and was a member of sourcing committees.  I was responsible for project planning and project management of development projects with up to 30 project team members and was functionally managing a team of software developers in India. I managed a development and maintenance budget of 6'€ p.a.
profile_positions.title: Manager Supplier and Process Controlling

profile_positions.description: I was responsible for process definition and documentation, organization management, definition of standards and workflows, financial controlling, and special projects.
profile_positions.title: Manager Process Management and Organization

profile_positions.description: I headed a team of 8 project managers and assistants who conducted marketing research and marketing service projects for industrial automotive and IT customers. My job included financial controlling, staffing, hiring, marketing management and process definition and improvement.
profile_positions.title: Director Project Management

profile_positions.description: I developed a product concept and the marketing of a sales-related information database for the IT and telecom industry and a product concept and project management for an online Lead Management system for automotive customers.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager

profile_positions.description: I taught graduate students in the areas of Organization Science, HR management, Innovation Management. My research areas were industrial marketing, relationship marketing, and team effectiveness.
profile_positions.title: Doctoral Researcher and Lecturer

profile_positions.description: I co-developed an online test for social competence in Bavarian police officers, participated in a collaborative research project on self-inspection at Mercedes Benz and another research project  on Women in Leadership. I taught undergraduate students in Psychological Research Methods and Diagnostics.
profile_positions.title: Researcher and Lecturer

volunteer_experiences.description: I translate the newsletter, the website, and social media posts from Dutch or English to German.
Copywriting and translations for Plenty Food Deutschland, a subsidiary of Plenty Food International.

Responsible for initiation, camerawork, video editing, and promotion of the Sustainability Matters @ RSM (formerly: Green Minutes) video series: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB40B35F6B03C15DE
Studio lighting, set-up, and camera work for several talk shows
Translating political texts from English to German.

company.name: KommPost Zeitung für Kommunikation e.V., Mannheim

volunteer_experiences.description: Publishing, layout, printing, and distribution of a bi-weekly paper for communication with hundreds of individual contributors
